context: <b6_0>New sequencing technologies<b6_0/>, such as <a0_0><b5_0>massive parallel sequencing<b5_0/><a0_0/> have also opened up the prospect of personal genome sequencing as a diagnostic tool, as pioneered by <a1_0><b8_0>Manteia Predictive Medicine<b8_0/><a1_0/>. A major step toward that goal was the completion in 2007 of the full genome of <a2_0>James D. Watson<a2_0/>, one of the co-discoverers of <a3_0><b4_0>the structure of <b7_0>DNA<b7_0/><b4_0/><a3_0/>.
